introduction: A story of a mother and daughter, separated by distance which builds walls between them over time.But will their dreams of each other help them reconnect?The film depicts the day of the girl's return home after a long time and her reconnection with her mother.一个关于一对母女的故事，随着时间的推移，距离在他们之间筑起了墙。但是他们对彼此的梦想会帮助他们重新联系吗？这部电影描述了女孩在很长一段时间后回家的那一天，以及她与母亲重新联系的那一天。
